title: Elevator - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Death   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manly Gay Couple   Murders   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   R*pe   Sadistic Characters   Secret Identity   Secrets   Short Story   Stalkers   Thriller   Twisted Personality   Unlucky Protagonist
author: Gongzi Heng   公子恒
description:
Don’t know since when there was a box inside the elevator in the corridor.

An ordinary cardboard box, a bit large, placed neatly against the wall in the corner of the elevator and occupied nearly a quarter of the space.

The box wasn't sealed shut.

It was dark inside, who knows what was inside of it.>
